data.comment: Victor Cantillo (Corinthians) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 1, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 5, In Rio de Janeiro Vasco da Gama attack through Andrey. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Corinthians's half.
In the minute 6, Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Ramiro of Corinthians gets in a strike, but is off target.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 11, Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Marllon's header is off-target for Corinthians.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Ederson (Corinthians) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 14, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama close to the penalty box.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a throw-in for Vasco da Gama, close to Corinthians's area.
Vasco da Gama push forward at São Januario and Talles Magno gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Corinthians defence.
In the minute 18, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Vasco da Gama in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 22, Vasco da Gama drives forward and Carlinhos gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Rio de Janeiro Vasco da Gama drive forward through Vinicius. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 23, Vasco da Gama push forward at São Januario and Leandro Castan gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Corinthians defence.
Gustavo Mantuan puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Juan Cazares with an assist there.
In the minute 26, Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Corinthians.
Leandro Castan (Vasco da Gama) has received a yellow card from Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Vasco da Gama.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Corinthians close to the penalty box.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 29, Fagner gets his shot on target but fails to score for Corinthians.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
In the minute 31, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 32, Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 33, Corinthians's Juan Cazares gets in a shot on goal at São Januario. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Talles Magno for Vasco da Gama drives towards goal at São Januario. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Andrey.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 39, Andrey has recovered and rejoins the match in Rio de Janeiro.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira blows against Vasco da Gama's Ribamar for offside.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Corinthians needs to be cautious. Vasco da Gama have an attacking throw-in.
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Vasco da Gama have a dangerous throw-in.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Rio de Janeiro.
Corinthians's Ederson has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Corinthians push upfield but Caio Max Augusto Vieira quickly pulls them for offside.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
In the minute 50, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Corinthians.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Corinthians throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
In the minute 53, Vasco da Gama make their first substitution with Leonardo Gil replacing Andrey.
Great shot from Vasco da Gama's Ribamar but he is denied by the crossbar.
Vasco da Gama's Marcos Junior breaks free at São Januario. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 54, Corinthians have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 56, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Vasco da Gama capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Corinthians's half?
Vasco da Gama are pushing forward but Vinicius's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 57, Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 59, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Corinthians drive forward but Gustavo Mantuan is judged offside.
In the minute 64, Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 66, Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a throw-in for Vasco da Gama, close to Corinthians's area.
Free kick in a good position for Vasco da Gama!
In the minute 68, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lucas Santos is replacing Marcos Junior for the home team.
In the minute 70, Corinthians's Ederson attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Everaldo is on a sub for Gustavo Mantuan for Corinthians.
Goal! Ribamar levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 72, Great play from Talles Magno to set up the goal.
In Rio de Janeiro Corinthians drive forward through Mateus Vital. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
In the minute 75, Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Vasco da Gama have a dangerous throw-in.
The away team replace Ederson with Guilherme Camacho.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Corinthians.
In the minute 78, Vagner Mancini (Corinthians) is making a second substitution, with Gustavo Silva replacing Ramiro.
In the minute 79, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Bruno Gomes is replacing Vinicius for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
The home team have replaced Ribamar with Guilherme Parede. This is the third substitution made today by Ricardo Sa Pinto.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 81, Carlinhos (Vasco da Gama) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for Corinthians at São Januario.
Vagner Mancini is making the team's fourth substitution at São Januario with Luan replacing Juan Cazares.
Throw-in for Corinthians at São Januario.
Vasco da Gama's Talles Magno gets in a shot on goal at São Januario. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 83, Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 85, Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 88, Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Guilherme Parede of Vasco da Gama smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Carlinhos for Vasco da Gama drives towards goal at São Januario. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama's Bruno Gomes misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Throw-in for Corinthians close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Corinthians.
Full-time! The final score is 1-2.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Henrique Silva.
